title: Really sick of losing games because bottom lane has 4x deaths over kills at 15 minutes
body: Can we please punish these players in some way that doesn't take down the rest of their team?

replies.body: punish someone because they cant have a perfect game everygame? Let's just hope you never have a bad game.
